About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Assignment Is In Safe Hands

I work in a team based environment and I contact customer by phone to remind them of overdue payments and render prompt service on customers’ requests. I also seek supervisor’s advice in solving irregular cases. My work also include providing administration work related to collection such as updating delinquent account history, updating customers’ data, providing payment instruction, preparing payment adjustment vouchers, statements and letters.

Award One

Indian Institute of Banking and Finance(RBI) for taking collection and finance

Award Two

(RACIT) Rajasthan State Certified Information Technology

Award Three

Gold Medal in India vs England International Kho-Kho Tournament which took place in London, England
